1.title: Wendy's 10th Season Premiere!

episode of.title: Wendy: The Wendy Williams Show (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Wendy weighs in on the latest Hot Topics and the biggest celebrity headlines from the summer; a lucky Wendy watcher has the chance to win $10,000 in "Wendy's 10K a Day Giveaway";

2.title: Inside Scoop!

episode of.title: Wendy: The Wendy Williams Show (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: NaughtyGossip.com's Rob Shuter gives the inside scoop on the latest news from Hollywood; Wendy dishes about the biggest Hot Topics; a Wendy watcher plays for the chance to win $10,000;

3.title: Jane Lynch & Kate Flannery!

episode of.title: Wendy: The Wendy Williams Show (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Acclaimed actresses Jane Lynch and Kate Flannery dish about their Café Carlyle debut with "Two Lost Souls"; a Wendy watcher is quizzed on how well they know the show in "Wendy's 10K a Day Giveaway";

4.title: Tamar Braxton! #2

episode of.title: Wendy: The Wendy Williams Show (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Tamar Braxton hits the Wendy couch to dish about her marriage, sisters and upcoming stage play with Snoop Dogg, "Redemption of a Dogg"; Wendy dishes about the latest Hot Topics and a lucky Wendy watcher plays for the chance to win $10,000;

episode of.title: Wendy: The Wendy Williams Show (TV Series 2008– )

imdb.title: Wendy: The Wendy Williams Show
plot: Talk show where 'Wendy Williams' (qv) chats about celebrity gossip and what's new in the entertainment world.
